title: How to Beat Vanilla Ghost House in Super Mario World

steps.title: Get the Yoshi coin and jump up to get a "Power Up" from the question box.
steps.content: Get the Yoshi coin and jump up to get a "Power Up" from the question box. Then, avoid the Circling Boo Buddies by jumping from ledge to ledge.

steps.title: One of the Turn Blocks contains a vine that reaches to an alternative route.
steps.content: One of the Turn Blocks contains a vine that reaches to an alternative route. If you have a cape, you can fly up and collect another Yoshi coin and regular coins. Choose the main route and find a question block with a Big Boo.

steps.title: You will then find a lone Boo and another pair of Circling Boo Buddies.
steps.content: You will then find a lone Boo and another pair of Circling Boo Buddies. You'll also find a Coin Block (10 regular coins) and a Yoshi coin on top of the block.

steps.title: As you are in a room of Big Bubbles, look for 3 blocks.
steps.content: As you are in a room of Big Bubbles, look for 3 blocks. The middle one contains a "P-Switch". Carry the P-Switch with you, and through the regular door. While avoiding Boos, continue carrying it into you see an outline of coins in the shape of a door. Still carrying the P-Switch, jump up to collect all of the coins.

steps.title: You should now be able to enter the door.
steps.content: You should now be able to enter the door. The Goal Gate can be seen and the level is completed.
